== RDV 1.9 Released - _July 18, 2008_ ==

RDV 1.9 has been released and contains significant new features for viewing images and video, a new dial visualization, and support for exporting MATLAB files. A number of smaller improvements for plotting have been added in addition to a few bug fixes. Download the [http://code.google.com/p/rdv/downloads/list?q=label:1.9 binary or source release] and read more about this release in the [http://code.google.com/p/rdv/wiki/ReleaseNotes#RDV_1.9_-_July_18,_2008 release notes].

== RDV 1.8 Released - _January 23, 2008_ ==

RDV 1.8 has been released with new support for importing [http://opensees.berkeley.edu/ OpenSees] XML data files and for importing video stills contained in a zip files. Download the [http://code.google.com/p/rdv/downloads/list?q=label:1.8 binary or source release] and read more about this release in the [http://code.google.com/p/rdv/wiki/ReleaseNotes#RDV_1.8_-_January_23,_2008 release notes].

== RDV 1.7 Released - _September 14, 2007_ ==

RDV 1.7 has been released with support added for streaming audio playback, a new data export for JPEG images and video, and a few bug fixes. Download the [http://code.google.com/p/rdv/downloads/list?q=label:1.7 binary or source release] and read more about this release in the [http://code.google.com/p/rdv/wiki/ReleaseNotes#RDV_1.7_-_September_14,_2007 release notes].
